privacyPolicyContent:
Privacy Policy

Welcome to Kairos. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our services.

1. Information We Collect

We collect information directly from you and through your use of our services. This includes:

  • Location Data: We collect your geographic location to provide accurate weather forecasts.
  • Usage Data: We collect information about your interactions with our website to improve our services.

2. How We Use Your Information

Your information is used for:

  • Providing accurate and personalized weather forecasts based on your location.
  • Improving our website and services by analyzing user behavior.
  • Communicating with you about updates, offers, and news related to our services.

3. Sharing Your Information

We do not share your personal data with third parties, except:

  • When required by law or to comply with legal processes.
  • To protect the rights, property, or safety of Kairos, our users, or the public.

4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings.

5. Data Security

We implement security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access and use. However, no online service is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

6. Weather Forecast Disclaimer

Our weather forecasts are based on data from various models. While we strive for accuracy, we cannot guarantee the accuracy of our forecasts and are not liable for decisions made based on our information.

7. Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on our website.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at privacy@kairos.gr.
